ComicInfo.Penciller: Eric Powell,Kyle Hotz,Mark Buckingham,Mark Buckingham,Kyle Hotz
ComicInfo.Summary:
When Sproule’s Biological Curiosities and Wild West Extravaganza pulls into town on Halloween, it’s all tricks and little treats for Goon and company. The cast of Billy the Kid’s Old Timey Oddities guest-star in this multigenerational mystery.
Includes a black-and-white Goon short illustrated by Mark Buckingham (Fables).
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-13 00:18:21. [CVDB369065]

ComicInfo.Title: The Bog Lurk That Lurked like a Thing! A Bad Thing! Part 3; Billy the Kid’s Old Timey Oddities
